name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation, long battery life, and immersive sound experience.

name: Smart Watch
description: A stylish smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and phone notifications.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic gaming mouse with customizable RGB lighting and high-precision sensor.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with tactile switches for enhanced gaming and typing experience.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with deep bass, touch controls, and water resistance.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact Bluetooth speaker with powerful bass, long battery life, and waterproof design.

name: Laptop Stand
description: Adjustable and foldable laptop stand for better ergonomics and cooling.

name: Wireless Charger
description: Fast wireless charger compatible with all Qi-enabled devices.

name: Smartphone Tripod
description: Lightweight and adjustable smartphone tripod for stable video recording and photography.

name: External Hard Drive
description: 1TB external hard drive with USB 3.0 for fast data transfer and secure storage.
